landing.title: Overview
landing.motd: We have had reports of top ups not being processed. Usually your balance will be refunded within 48 hours. It would help us a lot if you could send a mail to sudosos@gewis.nl if this happens to you. Sadly we cannot detect these things as this happens between our payment processor and iDeal.

settings.confirmChangeApiKey: Are you sure you want to change the API key?
settings.confirmDeleteApiKey: Are you sure you want to delete the API key?

balance.allIsFines: All of which is a fine
